column5: Hope he's not guiding you!you'll starve
I heard via the grapevine that random tests at the border to enter Canada are no longer being conducted. Anybody have evidence otherwise? I'm hoping that isn't just a rumor.
As of 5/20/22 my rider was the lucky recipient of the blue box (covid test kit) Took about a half hour
Shoot. Where did you cross the border at? Any issues finding wifi?

Both my passenger and I were chosen for random testing on 5/23/22. Crossing at Fort Frances, they recommended that we park in the gravel lot close by in order to get good reception. Took close to 45 minutes.
Crossed at Fort Francis, went to the parking lot at the drop box location. No problems with a wifi connection. It was a minor inconvenience but worth it for the week of catching we had
So do they call you with results?
Nope, sent an email of negative test results.
And if you're on a remote trip, you won't receive the email until you're already on your way out of Canada.
Trudeau will call you with the results,don't answer your phone,let him keep trying you,good luck on your trip.
I think he guiding us for 2 days. just 2 more days!
